page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN SHREWSBURY.
page.content: Shrewsbury isn't very industrial. It hasn't got many industries,only about eight factories in the town centre.We found that there are two main types of industry;{engineering and{food processing.}The largest engineers are{Perkins}who make large diesel engines for the Army.The rest are agricultural engineers.There are two other industries;{Family Loaf}the bakers who make lots of bread and {Albrew Maltsters}who make malt out of barley. Around Shrewsbury there are lots of farms and they keep the{agricultural industries in business. The farms produce wheat and barley for the bread and malt industries. They also provide the market for the farming equipment produced by the agricultural engineers.
